conversation.message: Hello Nursery_C, I’m Parent_E and I’m applying for your available place. Nursery_C is my first choice because your environment and approach are the best fit for our family, and we’re ready to accept immediately if offered. Thank you for considering my application.

Since accepting Parent_E now would block a better available candidate (Parent_D) and potentially even higher-priority candidates in later rounds, I should reject Parent_E to preserve the seat for higher-priority matches.
